notificationBody: You have received a new offer on your listed item. Check it out to see the details and respond accordingly.
Visit your offers section to review and respond to the offer.
Make sure to review the offer details carefully before making a decision.
Congratulations! Your item has been successfully sold. Check your account for the details.
Ensure you fulfill the order promptly to maintain a high seller rating.
Thank you for using our platform for your sales. Keep listing more items to continue your success.
Exciting news! The January freebies are here. Claim your free items now.
Visit the freebies section to see what's available this month.
Don't miss out on these limited-time offers. Grab your freebies today!

notification: A new rating has been received.
notificationBody: Great news! You've received a new rating. Check out the details of your latest feedback.
Visit your profile to see all your ratings and reviews.
Maintain high standards to continue receiving positive feedback from your customers.
